attributes.action: Come clean about the FAILURE of Speed Cameras to reduce accident rates and then abolish all forms of automated speed detection
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Governments own published statistical evidence points to its failure to reduce road casualties by Automated Speed Detection.

This has resulted in an increase in accidents and death rates, but a reduction in Police Offices on traffic duty.

Scrap the cameras and camera partnerships and increase the number of traffic offices.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Come clean about the FAILURE of Speed Cameras to reduce accident rates and then abolish all forms of automated speed detection."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page10844.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/NoSpeedCameras/
